name: Sam Quater's Diary
description: ### **Small Notes ** This are going to be a Storyline after the Breakout. Sam Quater is the main Char. and a Ghost/Spectre from the ShadowBlade project. Sam wants his revenge for that massacre Mengsk made on his Home plant Wara Mara. While Jim Raynor on Char, Sam are getting a crew for his mission on Wara Mara. There are gonna be more, this is just the beginning. I could need some help from ppl, couse am not the best editor and if you want to help me, plz PM me :) #### **I need bit Info about:** Modeling, Animetion and Texture: I could need some help with it, becouse i got some ideas for some new units for the storyline.
author: _ForgeUser4897290
